scenario_text.value:
Hey, Aoi. Could you tell me more about what
happened before?

Did something happen to Miyuki...? And
speaking of which, where’s Haru?
Uhh...

Do you remember how Haru fainted during the
fight against Garurumon?

Yeah, we left him in a corner of the factory
for safekeeping.

Right. So after things finished up, we
grabbed Haru and made it back here, somehow.

But then when he woke up, Haru was incredibly
upset by Miyuki’s absence.

I can see that... Of course he’d be worried
if his sister disappeared.

By the next morning, Haru had disappeared,
too.
He did...?

We think he went to look for Miyuki. His
wounds hadn’t even mended...

Oh no... Do you have any idea where he might
have gone?

I’m afraid not. We looked everywhere for him,
but...

Yeah, about that...
Right now we have no idea where he is.

We looked everywhere for him, but to no
avail.
So Haru’s gone, too...

Yes, we’re all quite worried. I hate to think
of such a small child going off on his own.

Well yeah, but there’s nothing we can do by
ourselves, here.

To be honest, we’ve had our hands full just
taking care of ourselves.

Saki, that’s... Well, I guess there’s no
point in splitting hairs.

Like Saki says, it’s taken everything just to
stay alive.
But Aoi kept us all together this whole time.
You saved me a bunch, too!
No, that’s not...

Come on, no need to be modest.
Aoi here’s amazing!
What do you mean?

You see how the pressure of this situation
puts everyone on edge, right?

That’s why everyone was always at each
other’s throats. But Aoi...

Aoi kept all of us together with her magic
touch.
Magic touch?
What’s that?
Mmm-hmm. What do you think I mean?

(I wonder... Maybe she means like a healing
touch, treating everyone’s wounds?)

(Or wait, did she awaken to some sort of
magical power while we were away?!)
(I can hardly imagine, but you never know...)
(What’s this “magic touch” of hers?)
She healed everyone?
Aoi’s a wizard?!
Not a clue, honestly.
She healed everyone?

Did she treat everyone’s wounds? That’d
explain why everyone trusts her so much.
Oh, well I guess you have a point there.

Right? Aoi’s so, how do I put it... Devoted?
Motherly?
What?! T-Takuma, you think of me that way?

Well yeah, that part of you’s always a big
help to the rest of us.
Really? Me, motherly...
Hehe, I admit I’m a little flustered...
Oh, for sure! That’s our Mama Aoi over here!

Just having her around gives everyone some
peace of mind.
You too, Saki? Jeez...

Still, that’s not the magic touch I was
talking about.
Wait, really?
Aoi’s a wizard?!

Don’t tell me... Aoi gained some kinda magic
power?!
What?!

And like, she beat back an onslaught of
monsters, making her the de facto leader?

Ahaha, I love it! And lightning rains down
from the sky every time she scolds us!
Aoi’s Lecture Lightning...
Pffft hahaha, stop! You’re killing me!

Or how about Aoi’s Rain On Your Parade
attack?
...You two giggling at my expense, are you?
Sorry, sorry. Just a joke.
Ahaha, you sure get some funny ideas, Takuma.
Thanks, I guess...
Not a clue, honestly.
Umm... I honestly don’t know.
Oh come on, you gotta at least guess.

I tried, really! Like maybe she takes care of
everyone, or tends to their wounds...

But she’s been like that since the beginning,
so I’m stumped.

Laaame. You hardly know a thing about our
girl, do you?

Um, Saki... You can hardly expect him to
answer a question like that out of the blue.

Sorry to disappoint... So then what’s the
answer?
Cooking! I’m talking about her cooking!

She kept our bellies full with her food, and
our hearts at peace with her words.
Ahhh, so that’s what you meant.

Glad to hear how good her food is. Nothing
soothes the soul like a good meal.
Aoi sure knows her way around a stove!

It’s not like I whipped up anything special.
I just made due with what we had.
...She’s been so caring, too.

Did I tell you? I had planned to go to the
hospital after camping.
Don’t say that, Saki!
It’s fine, it’s fine.
...The hospital? Is something wrong?
Nothing major.

The doctor was all, “I suggest you go at
once!” Blah blah blaaah, what a blowhard.

I honestly didn’t see what the big deal was,
myself.
Is that right...?

(Now that I think about it, Saki’s always
seemed to tire out pretty quickly.)

(Did this illness of hers have anything to do
with it?)

(Still, she talks about it like it’s nothing,
so...can’t be that bad, right?)
Hey now, why so serious? I’m fine, I swear.

But when we came to this world, all my plans
for hospitals or surgery went up in smoke.

And yet...because of this, I feel like I can
do anything I want to, without holding back.

Do you have any idea what that feels like,
Takuma?

I told all this to Aoi, and she’s really
sympathized with me ever since.

This may sound weird for me to say, but I’m
glad I joined this camping trip.
You are?

Sure! We got thrown into this world, and so
much scary stuff has happened...

But getting to spend time with you, Aoi and
the others...

I feel like I’ve made memories to a last
a lifetime!
Haha, like, as if, right?
Saki...

(To Saki, who had to worry about
hospitalization and surgery...)

(This treacherous world is a place where she
can move freely...)

(If she’s been here supporting Aoi, I can see
how they’ve grown so close.)
What can I do next, Aoi?
Let’s see... Can you peel the veggies for me?

(Just seeing those two together puts my heart
at ease.)

Don’t go giving me special treatment just
’cuz you know the whole story now!

Hee hee, I know, I know. Just don’t overdo
it, okay?
(Those two really are a pair...)
